Shortly after Staines' last try in Penrith's 56-24 demolition of the Sharks, the pub posted a message on Facebook: "Pub for sale ... $1. BYO BEER".
"We had about 50 people and it got busier and busi… [+2048 chars]

articles.author: NRL.com
articles.title: Round 9 charges: Latrell, Reynolds out, Nicholls, Smith facing bans - NRL.COM
articles.description: All the official charges from the match review committee for Round 9 of the Telstra Premiership.
articles.content:
Rabbitohs star Latrell Mitchell has taken the early guilty plea for both of his charges from Friday night meaning he will be out for the next two weeks.
He was facing a three-match ban if he took on… [+6036 chars]
